thread.title: Panthers to release DT Paul Soliai
thread.title_full: Panthers to release DT Paul Soliai

author: Stephen Igoe
title: Panthers to release DT Paul Soliai
text:
Panthers to release DT Paul Soliai Carolina is parting ways with DT Paul Soliai after one year. Slot to Carolina Panthers Newsletter Newsletter 
The Carolina Panthers are set to release veteran defensive tackle Paul Soliai . 
The decision ends a one-year stay in Carolina for Soliai, who inked a two-year deal last offseason after a stint in Atlanta. 
Soliai's management company, TeamDEC Management, shared the news on Tuesday . 
The release of Soliai will save the Panthers $2.5 million against the cap. Soliai, who started his career with the Dolpins, signed a deal over two years worth $7 million last offseason. Soliai figured to be a bigger part of the defensive tackle rotation, but he totaled just eight tackles in 10 games, and he was a healthy scratch for a handful of outings. 
Soliai has played 10 NFL seasons with 156 career tackles and 5.5 sacks. Author
